p: Determination of IC 50 values were performed using the GraphPad Prism 7.04 software (La Jolla, CA, USA) as nonlinear regression and gives as log(inhibitor) vs. response (three parameter, constrain equal to 0). IC 50 values represent the dilution factor of the plasma sample to obtain 50% inhibition of pseudotyped vector transduction and are given without units. The mean values and standard deviations were calculated in Excel.
